author: Anonymous Gear
title: couldn't receive email
question: Hi, I did what the instruction said, but every time I want to reset the gradescope password, I couldn't receive emails from my forwarding email address, I changed two different email addresses, but still couldn't receive email to reset password, could someone help me?
student_answer: It took a while for mine to be sent to my email, like five to ten minutes. Thus, I suggest just waiting a bit more!
